narrative.title: 1St Armored Division - 1943Q2
narrative.situation: American Armored Division deployed in North Africa during 1943Q2.
narrative.objectives: Mobile armored warfare: breakthrough, exploitation, pursuit. Learned lessons from Kasserine Pass defeat (Feb 1943).
narrative.axis_objective: Hold current positions and prevent Allied breakthrough.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and neutralize Axis defensive positions.

weather.terrain: Mixed terrain: coastal plains, rocky hills (Djebels), wadis, some desert patches

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Combat Command task organization (flexible combined arms)
